source_sentence: 華嚴清涼國師禮讚文(并敘)
translation: Hymn of Respect to the National Teacher Huayan Qingliang (with commentary)
An account of the Dharma grandson Nagarjuna (Zhihui)
Our patriarch, the National Teacher Xianshou.
He opened the school and judged its teaching.
The sūtras exhausted one generation.
His teachings were cut off from the teachings of a hundred schools.
He interpreted the Tang Zetian emperor's reign as the emperor's queen.
He translated the Flower Ornament.
It reached nineteen fascicles.
He hadn't yet completed his great vow.
He died peacefully and truly.
Qingliang first ascended to the seat of the Xianshou Dharma.
He transmitted the cultivation of faith and other doctrines.
He was mindful that there were no permanent teachers of learning.
He was then consulted by people and paid homage to the north.
He sought the Dharma in the south.
He took his study in all directions.
He studied three times in the Daoist classics.
Again, he approached Xianshou Jiangza.
It was then that my teacher moved to convert me.

source_sentence: 雖高甲宗一慧苑慧英等輩。

Qingliang suddenly felt a sense of admiration.

source_sentence: 故別製新經疏二十卷(或開為四十卷)。
translation: He therefore prepared a new commentary on the scriptures in twenty separate volumes (or forty volumes).
This is a forty-fascicle commentary that follows the sūtras and presents the meaning.

source_sentence: (或開六十卷或開八十卷)其疏鈔皆不違先師之意。

translation: He also compiled one hundred volumes of manual guides to accompany the text.
He compiled the Essentials of Huayan in three volumes.
One volume of the Profound Mirror of the Dharma Realm.
One volume of the Jingteng shuowen. One volume of the Sanshing yuanrong guan.
One volume of the contemplation on the interpenetration of the three sages.

source_sentence: 華嚴圓覺四分中觀等經律關脈三十餘部。
translation: There are more than thirty scriptures, rules, and related texts, such as the Huayan Sutra of Perfect Enlightenment and the Four Part Meditation.

source_sentence: 嘻推功祖德清涼當克獨祭近得甌越。
translation: Hey, we should dedicate our ancestral merit to Qingliang, so we can make our own offerings to Ou Yue in the near future.

Wouldn't it be appropriate?
Everyone uses the term Yilong as their title.

'Here we are, the Giryū group.

"I've been studying for 30 years.

"This is the marvelous technique of the Shared Teaching.
It ends with the ancient rules of chanting.
It's pervasive throughout the seven places and nine assemblies.

And it's explained in detail.
The ocean of meaning is vast and rippling.
A single pole sings it high.

And the vast expanse of the Dharma realm.
Momentarily, it doesn't budge.
It then extends through a long period of time.
It drains away the flood of nature and characteristics from their source.
He penetrates the straight path of cause and effect.
He transcends all the classics.
It's like pushing a mountain into a high peak.
It collects all the scriptures.
He's like a river pouring into a vast ocean.
He's like a golden crow in the sky.
It catches the light of many views.
The bright jade rabbit.
It conceals the colors of the remaining stars.

It's esoteric and difficult to fathom.
It's not something that can be known by people on lower ground.
It must be accessible to the highest faculties.

source_sentence: 爰自龍宮選妙鳳闕翻靈。
translation: I've selected the marvelous Phoenix Palace from the dragon palace to reveal its spirit.
Its flowers are rotten in the western dry season.
It's fragrant with leaves in the eastern summer.
Without disinterest, he drove his teaching.
The five celestials greeted him with a blessing in the true wind.
Without fail, he proclaims it loudly.
All the nations [rain/parts] receive the Dharma rain.
Perfectly luminous is the chief companion.
From generation to generation, there's no lack of people.
They should inspire sages and worldlings.
It's a new era for later philosophers.
The first of these good men sang in the snow.
The clear and cool continue to sing in the sunny spring.
The original heroic exposition.
He opened the groove of the five teachings.
He embodies the great teaching.
It guides the path of the ten schools.
He demonstrated the form of the U family.
He descended from the Tang dynasty to follow the footsteps of the Tang.
He admires the fragrance of the camphor among the flowers.
He envied the preciousness of the sandalwood in the forest.
He shaved off his hair and beard.
He tossed away his robes and hairpins.
He left his home in the three realms in an open manner.
He then unhinderedly escapes the dreams of the four lives.
His eloquence is divine.
His training and learning give rise to knowledge.
He became the gatekeeper of the seven emperors.
He has passed through the holy ages of the nine schools.
The clouds of virtue are dense and cloudy.
Their fame and wings are resplendent.
He's a group of lonely people who have set a standard.
He unifies the community of monks and stands alone.
The place of quiescence is the focus of his transformation.
It's the spring when the flowers are broken and the willows are withered.
When he's finished with his task.
There's only the preface of the arrival of the buddha in the morning and evening.

source_sentence: 諱晨旦偶祭享宜陳略聲巴俚之詞。
translation: It's appropriate to present a short speech about the festival on the morning and evening.
I'd like to propose an offering of algae and apples.
I'm a humble reward for the milk of the Dharma.
It's a humble reward for our great kindness.
I hope that the eye of the Way will be clear and insightful.
I hope that other minds will be made clear.
Teachers are endowed with the ability to sense.
The moon and water shine brightly.
In view of my devotion.
I beg you to grant me permission to descend.
(Prostrating with one bow, he rises to exchange prostrations)
Kneeling down, he held the fireplace in his hands and asked, "Please!)
"With one heart, we respectfully request.
He was the chief of the Huayan teaching ocean, Xianshou Yilong.

source_sentence: 第六祖師清涼尊者(三請三拜然後說偈)。
translation: The sixth patriarch, Venerable Qingliang (three invitations and three prostrations, then he spoke a verse).

source_sentence: 稽首華嚴菩薩海　　普賢悲願久修心　四依德行妙通依　　五地功熏難勝地　三觀已深超解脫　　十身將證入圓融　分形普化寄唐朝　　說法遍霑生禹族　聲震寰中咸軌範　　名聞世表盡宗師　經龍律虎間生才　　僧統國師曇蕚瑞(至此陳白不然則修一疏宣之)。
translation: "Greetings to the Huayan bodhisattva ocean, the long-cultivated mind of Samantabhadra, the marvelous and penetrating support of virtuous conduct, the difficult and surpassing ground of the five stages of effort and perfuming, the three contemplations that have profoundly transcended liberation, the ten bodies that are about to be realized into perfect interpenetration, the fractal forms that universally transform the Tang dynasty, the teachings that pervade the lands, the birth of the U clan, the voices that shake the world, and the examples that follow, the well-known, world-famous, and fully expressed patriarchal teachers, the scriptures, the dragons, the laws, the talents that arise between tigers, the national teacher of the monks, and the Tanqizhou Rui." (Otherwise, he would have cultivated a commentary to proclaim it.)
He paid homage with one heart.
Huayan jiaohai xianshou yilong.

source_sentence: 出胎分慶時身清涼尊者(從清涼字和之)。
translation: He emerged from the womb as the body of Venerable Qingliang at the time of the Genkai era (from the word Qingliang, we blend it).

source_sentence: 四依應跡生王族　　十月形成出聖胎　祥瑞希奇動眾心　　光明煥赫驚鄰室　照世星眸藏襁褓　　懸河海辯擁衣衾　善才法爾又童真　　性德重開珍寶藏故我一心歸命頂禮(下皆倣此)。
translation: In accordance with the four traces of response, he was born into a royal family, and in the tenth month he formed a sacred fetus. His auspicious and rare appearance moved the hearts of many people, his radiance was brilliant and brilliant, and he startled the neighbors by shining his starry eyes on the world, hiding his swaddling clothes, holding his robe and bedding in the river and sea, being a talented man, a child, and a true one, his nature and virtue reopened his treasures, so I wholeheartedly bowed my head in homage (the following are to follow suit).
I wholeheartedly bow in homage.
*Huayan Kyohai Xianshou Yilong.

source_sentence: 嬉童入寺時身清涼尊者。
translation: When he entered the temple, he was a youthful boy, the body of Venerable Qingliang.

source_sentence: 福擬百童嚴塔像　　嬉遊眾藝聚泥沙　差無白馬詣青山　　悅有寶林逾雲嶺　掃灑六塵求解脫　　躋攀四智學菩提　一周歲曜發靈機　　三藏微言皆曉達一心頂禮。
translation: 福擬百童嚴塔像　　嬉遊眾藝聚泥沙　差無白馬詣青山　　悅有寶林逾雲嶺　掃灑六塵求解脫　　躋攀四智學菩提　一周歲曜發靈機　　三藏微言皆曉達一心頂禮。
Huayan jiaohai xianshou yilong.

source_sentence: 奉恩落[髟/采]時身清涼尊者。
translation: I'm honored to have the body of Venerable Lakṣmī [Shaggy/Cai] clear and cool at the time.

source_sentence: 祝髮染緇除俗態　　奉恩遵禁入僧倫　金刀剪剪綠絲飄　　玉璽輝輝黃勑鎮　窣堵福超功德重　　周羅髮盡垢塵輕　形權心實妙難思　　便是德雲從定起一心頂禮。
translation: When his hair is dyed black and he rids himself of worldly ways, he conforms to the prohibitions and enters the community of monks. The golden sword cuts the green threads, the jade seal glows brightly, the yellow serge subdues, the stūpa blessings exceed the virtues, and the Cūḍāla hair ends the dirt and dust, and the form, powers, and mind are truly marvelous and unfathomable. It's when clouds of virtue arise from concentration and he pays homage with one mind.
Huayan jiaohai xianshou yilong.

source_sentence: 群經注演時身清涼尊者。
translation: Venerable Qingliang of the body at the time the scriptures were expounded.

source_sentence: 調理筌罤遊智刃　　從容科節銳詞鋒　楞嚴圓覺洞能詮　　般若涅槃明所解　文錦江心垂玉釣　　義花浪底擲金鈎　洪濤本意擷鯨鰲　　十四輕罾方便設一心頂禮。
translation: He tames the principle, wanders the edge of wisdom, follows the rules of discipline, sharpens the edge of words, penetrates the holes of Laṅkâvatāra, can explain, and understands what's explained in Prajñāpāramitā, dangles a jade fishing line from the heart of the river, tosses a gold hook from the bottom of the waves, and retrieves a whale and a frog from the bottom of the waves. Fourteen light net skillful devices are set up, and he pays homage with one mind.
Huayan teaches the ocean, and Xianshou Yilong.

source_sentence: 精傳諸論時身清涼尊者。
translation: He's the honored one who Jingzhuan's treatises and Qingliang's body at the time.

source_sentence: 宗釋覈(上革切)研咸秉志　　深探慧學不師心　十城封賞徤螢牕　　五日馳名工雪几　起信瑜伽親指授　　因明寶性力師承　縱橫九論鼓聲雄　　剛助肇公談四絕一心頂禮。
translation: Zunshi kanji (Shangge che), Yanhan Bingzhi, Shenzhe wisdom and training, not the teacher's mind, ten cities, Fengtai jiaoying, five days' fame, Gong Xueji, Awakening faith, Yoga, and personal instruction, Inmyō baoshen, and powerful teachers, Vertical and horizontal nine treatises, the drum's voice is heroic, Gangsuke Zhaogong discusses the four absolute truths, and wholeheartedly pays homage.
He was the chief dragon of the worthy in the Huayan teaching sea.

source_sentence: 優游觀法時身清涼尊者。
translation: Uyūkan Kōshin Shōbō Zunzhei.

source_sentence: 導達大方闚佛眼　　澄渟衍行逈禪心　蓮花止觀去情遊　　法界色空亡相入　台嶺明明藏智地　　終山歷歷現心地　還源深寂洗塵勞　　忽證普光平等理一心頂禮。
translation: Guiding him to fully attain the great mirror, the buddha's eye, Chenglian, Yanxing, and Qianzenxin, the lotus flower, calming observation, and the removal of emotions, the realm of reality, form, emptiness, and the disappearance of marks, Terrace Peak, Mingzang, and the ground of wisdom, Terminal Peak, and the successive manifestations of the mind, Return to the source of profound quiescence, and wash away the dust and trouble, and suddenly realize the principle of the equality of universal illumination with one heart, prostrating.
Huayan jiaohai xianshou yilong.

source_sentence: 圓明眾戒時身清涼尊者。
translation: Venerable Qingliang, the body of the Yuanming congregation at the time of the precepts.

source_sentence: 本期補特皆成佛　　纔淨尸羅福施生　聲聞軌轍究端倪　　菩薩車秉重控御　律悟開遮偏妙處　　戒登樓閣最高層　十弘要(平聲)誓緊浮囊　　三聚妍媸懸寶鑑一心頂禮。
translation: In this period, all the patriarchs have become buddhas, the talented purifier Śīlabhadra has produced blessings, the direct path of the direct disciples has been thoroughly researched, the bodhisattva's chariot has been heavily controlled, the precepts have been awakened, the obscurations have been opened, and the marvelous place has been reached, the ten vast essentials (flat voice) have been vowed, and the three clusters of ugly hanging jewels have been venerated with one heart.
Huayan teaches the ocean of wise men, the chief dragon of meaning.

source_sentence: 無名師證時身清涼尊者。
translation: Venerable Wulian Shizi Zhengshi chingliang.

source_sentence: 法界湛然超語迹　　宗門離念以心傳　教窮源本達枝流　　禪悟濬(私閏切)深參骨髓　虗寂觀中空寂趣　　無名師表離名求　洞明說默兩鎔融　　豈比筭沙徒自困一心頂禮。
translation: The Dharma realm is so sublime that it transcends the traces of language, the school is free from mindfulness and transmitted through the heart, the teaching exhausts its source and reaches its branches, Chan and Woo Joon (private leap cut) deeply penetrates the marrow, the void and quiescent state of mind in the calm and tranquil contemplation, the nameless teacher shows that he's free from the pursuit of fame, the insightful exposition and silence are both fused, how could it be compared to the travails of a monk who pays homage with a single heart?
Huayan teaches the ocean, and Xianshou Yilong.

source_sentence: 聞經能演時身清涼尊者。
translation: When he heard the sūtras, he could explain them to the audience, and then he was a clear and noble person.

source_sentence: 盡詫涅槃心易曉　　誰醒(平聲)差別智難明　不乘圓滿大因輪　　曷到汪洋真果海　無盡指歸觀掌上　　難思法術印胸中　再周能演動詵言　　法界洪規今在汝一心頂禮。
translation: Expecting nirvāṇa, his mind is easy to understand, who wakes up (flat voice), discriminating wisdom is difficult to understand, and who doesn't ride the full circle of great causes? How did he get to the vast ocean of true realization? His inexhaustible guidance is reflected in his palm, and he can't think of the Dharma technique that's imprinted in his chest. Then, he can expound it and move it in his speech. The flood of rules of the Dharma realm is now in your single-minded salutation.
Huayan jiaohai xianshou yilong.

source_sentence: 五峯祈請時身清涼尊者。
translation: Venerable Clearly Cooled One of the Five Peaks Prayer Body.

source_sentence: 聖智冥加祈寶積　　威神與力藉龍尊　十年麟筆貫花心　　五頂鳳牋標月志　真侶懇求敷創義　　法師開拓演新文　赤髭白足兩弘真　　瓶瀉雲興良可喻一心頂禮。
translation: His holy wisdom was mysteriously applied to pray for the accumulation of treasures, and his authoritative power and energy were attributed to Venerable Nāgârjuna. For ten years, the lion's brush pierced the heart of a flower, and five peaks of the phoenix marked the moon, and the true companions earnestly sought to present a new meaning, while the Dharma teacher developed and explained a new text.
Huayan teaches the noble chief, Giryū.

source_sentence: 通儒助釋時身清涼尊者。
translation: Venerable Qingliang, who at the time shared Confucianism and assisted Buddhism, was the body of the Buddha.

source_sentence: 俗學無裨雖佛誡　　道儒會釋始通方　本操五教作權衡　　兼握九經為斗赤　道德逍遙莊老志　　詩書仁義孔顏心　四圍章句五明宗　　十翼百家咸顧習一心頂禮。
translation: Although secular studies don't help, the Buddha's instructions, Daoism, Confucianism, and Buddhism begin to penetrate all directions, originally manipulating the five teachings as a counterweight, holding the nine scriptures together as a bucket of red, Daoism, virtue, and freedom, Zhuang Lao's aspiration, poetry, benevolence, and righteousness, Kong and Yan's heart, the four circumambient essays, the five luminous schools, the ten wings and one hundred schools, and all of them are practiced with one mind and prostrating at the top of one's head.
Huayan teaches the ocean of wise men, the chief dragon of meaning.

source_sentence: 疏成感夢時身清涼尊者。
translation: Venerable Qingliang, who at the time of the commentary's completion felt a dream.

source_sentence: 法食慶文猶吐鳳　　傳芳吉兆夢成龍　輝空鱗鬣亘雙臺　　耀世光明逾皦日　奮迅侃梭昭變化　　分飛雷劒讖流通　百川入海味同醎　　製錦操刀功不淺一心頂禮。
translation: He's like a phoenix celebrating the eating of the Dharma, a phoenix transmitting an auspicious omen, a dragon forming in a dream, a dragon whose sky is scaled and whose hyena stretches across two platforms, whose light shines brighter than the setting sun, whose swift kansho indicates changes, whose flying thunderclap is the circulation of an image, whose flavor is the same as sesame, whose brocade making and knife handling are not shallow, and whose prostration is unified in spirit.
Huayan teaches the ocean, and Xianshou Yilong.

source_sentence: 箋經普化時身清涼尊者。
translation: His scriptures universally transform the body of the emperor at the time, Venerable Qingliang.

source_sentence: 五色雲凝天上瑞　　八方人擁地中仙　九州慶溢扇慈風　　四海遐飛霑法雨　絳帳揮松傳百眾　　黌堂談柄烈千徒　名曹大手盡樞衣　　殉命奔趨求發藥一心頂禮。
translation: Five-colored clouds condense heavenly rays, eight directions embrace the immortals of the earth, nine states are overflowing with the breeze of kindness, four seas fly away with the rain of the Dharma, the trough swings pines and spreads a hundred multitudes, the colleges talk about the handles and martyrs a thousand disciples, the great hand of the renowned Cao exhausts the pivot clothes, martyrs run towards seeking to issue medicine, and one mind pays homage.
Huayan jiaohai xianshou yilong.

source_sentence: 群英雜述時身清涼尊者。
translation: Quying Zajie body Qingliang Zunzhe.

source_sentence: 述義屬文遺輔相　　摛毫麗藻惠公卿　七家貴宦笥珠珍　　十寺名僧囊錦繡　二要五篇三聖觀　　諸關雙鏡九經圖　蟠根聳本雜花功　　布葉垂陰章句力一心頂禮。
translation: He recites the meaning, appends the text, inherits the auxiliary director, spreads the fine alms, and bestows the pearls and treasures of the seven noble eunuchs, the ten famous monks of the temple, embroiders the two essentials, five articles, three holy contemplations, the twin mirrors, and nine sūtras, raises the fundamentals, mixes the flowers, spreads the leaves, drapes the shadows, and pays homage with one heart.
Huayan jiaohai xianshou yilong.

source_sentence: 新經譯贊時身清涼尊者。
translation: Venerable Qingliang, the body at the time of the new sūtra's translation," he said.

source_sentence: 增輝妙理因烏茶　　聖叡同翻預譯場　講贊何煩夢易(入聲)頭　　弘通不假仙呼藥　花開錦上重重媚　　雲起長空片片新　聖法高談悟帝心　　國師仍賜清涼號一心頂禮。
translation: Zonghui Miaoli in wu cha, Shengrui in tandem with the pre-translation site, lecture and praise, what's the trouble with the dream?
Huayan teaches the ocean, and Xianshou Yilong.

source_sentence: 談真歷遇時身清涼尊者。
translation: He talked about how truly he had met the time-honored Venerable Qingliang.

source_sentence: 壽永九宗天子世　　德高七帝國王師　四方卓犖拜先生　　三教清英推首坐　葵藿心傾光俗諦　　桑榆日晚暢真猷　詩章牋表動嚴宸　　對御談經欣慶會一心頂禮。
translation: Longevity, the nine schools, the lineage of the Son of God, virtue, the seven emperors, the king's teacher, the four directions, the distinguished personages, the three teachings, the noble ones, the venerable one, the head sitter, the sunflower-hued one, the mind tilted to the truth of the light, the secular one, the sun-upped one, the evening, the true one, the poems, the manifestation, and the moving one, Yan Chen, the joyous gathering at which the imperial scriptures are discussed, the wholehearted prostration.
Huayan teaches the ocean, and Xianshou Yilong.

source_sentence: 韜光順寂時身清涼尊者。
translation: Venerable Tso Kuang Shunji Sutra's body was quite cool.

source_sentence: 緣盡四心同有滅　　韜光三月示無常　重臣縞素愴賢心　　皇帝輟朝悽聖意　石室葬龕蒙國禮　　興唐塑皃動天文　闍維舌固朵紅蓮　　舍利數千光色潤(至此復跪秉爐運想披陳五悔)。
translation: When the four conditions ended, his mind was the same as existence's cessation, and the three months of his life showed impermanence.
He universally acknowledged the four kinds of kindnesses.
All three existences and sentient beings in the Dharma realm.
May they all be freed from the three hindrances.

source_sentence: 歸命懺悔(或運逆順十心於理無爽)。
translation: He returned to his life and confessed his repentance (sometimes carrying out the ten phases of contrary and deferential states of mind without distortion in principle).
He repents with his whole heart.

source_sentence: 忽忘廣大毗盧性　　妄躍無涯苦海津　波蕩千華本佛心　　漚成五蘊眾生相　十身妙好拘形殻　　十智光明墮惑情　一法纔迷萬法迷　　一塵暫起諸塵起　頓差三德成三毒　　豈達凡心即聖心　十剎常光瞽不窺　　十方遍說聾無聽　雖登毗奈如狂象　　已屬摩羅若啞羊　六相全虧朗智燈　　十玄鎮缺懸明鏡　百非四句增輕謗　　萬劫千生結重愆　我體真空觀慧門　　全修全性圓融懺懺悔已至心歸命三寶(下皆例此)。
translation: Having suddenly forgotten the vast nature of Vairocana, he falsely leaps into the limitless ocean of suffering, wandering through a thousand flowers that were originally the Buddha's mind, forming the five aggregates of the characteristics of sentient beings, the ten bodies of wonderful beauty, constricting form, and the ten wisdoms of illumination, he falls into the delusion that while one thing is rarely confused, all things are confused, and one dust momentarily arises, and all other dusts arise, suddenly missing the three virtues and becoming the three poisons.
I sincerely urge them to do so.

source_sentence: 毛孔微塵容佛處　　剎那劫海說經時　鏡光帝網道場中　　願轉法輪窮後際至心隨喜　十方三世微塵佛　　八相圓成眾善根　六道諸乘行願因　　隨喜皆修功德海至心回向　願學普賢深信解　　圓修萬行等虗空　菩提實際與眾生　　回向湛然真法界至心發願　不捨千輪功德海　　常持十本大華嚴　普招群品剖塵經　　遍拉眾生刳識藏　在果在因能說法　　居凡居聖善修心　即於普眼見遮那　　不離普賢觀妙德　三聖圓融歸當念　　十身無礙應塵方　未來劫剎道場中　　等願法王稱長子自歸於佛。
translation: When the tiny particle of a pore contains a buddha, when the scriptures are taught in the ocean of kalpas and eons, in the middle of the Daṇḍa net path, may the turning of the wheel of the Dharma reach its limit with utmost joy and sincerity. May the three worlds of dusty buddhas in the ten directions have eight characteristics that perfectly form the good roots of all sentient beings in the six vehicles, and may the causes of their vows be followed with joy and cultivation of the ocean of merit with utmost joy and sincerity. May I train in the profound understanding of Samantabhadra, completely cultivate all practices in space, actualize bodhi and sentient beings, and dedicate myself to the true Dharma realm of Zhanran with utmost faith and vow not to abandon the thousand-wheel ocean of merit.
May all sentient beings realize the great way.
Understand the great way ...
They'll give rise to the unsurpassed intention.
He gives himself back to the Dharma.
May sentient beings deeply enter the sutra canon.
deeply enter the store of sūtras.
Their wisdom is like an ocean.
I take refuge in the saṃgha.
May all sentient beings ...
unify the principle of the masses.
All are unimpeded.

source_sentence: 華嚴清涼國師禮讚文一卷
translation: Huayan Qingliang guoshi xanwen yiqie
